name: Outdoor World Direct
overview:
Outdoor World is a specialist retailer of camping equipment, outdoor equipment and tents, stocking brands such as Vango, Coleman, Outwell, North Face, Regatta and many more. The company was founded in 1999 by Eric Scotland, opening the first high street store in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire. Renowned for high service levels and quality products, the shop has established a firm relationship with its loyal customers.

Since then the company has grown through e-commerce with their successful website OutdoorWorldDirect.co.uk currently in its fifth year of online trading. The website now sells to over ten countries in the European Union and is constantly expanding its product ranges to meet the ever changing demands of the modern customer.

The website offers everything you could possible ever need for camping, from adventure mountain camping to family camping, OutdoorWorldDirect.co.uk has one of the finest selections of camping equipment from the best suppliers in the industry. All of the camping products sold by OutdoorWorldDirect.co.uk are tried and tested in the field before they even reach the marketplace to ensure that they will meet high customer expectations.

Our assistants are fully trained and are available during the week to offer advice on any product in our range, their extensive knowledge can help you decide which products most suit your camping needs.
